terms.title: Terms
terms.summary: Rules and guidelines for using Galaxium.
content: By using Galaxium, you agree to follow all applicable laws and platform rules.
Abuse, exploitation, or attempts to disrupt service availability are prohibited.
These terms may be updated as the service evolves.

privacy.title: Privacy
content: Galaxium only collects data needed to operate and secure the service.
Data is not sold to third parties.
Users can request clarification about stored account information.

about.title: About
content: Galaxium is built to provide simple and clear platform experiences.
We focus on performance, clarity, and transparent communication.
Policy pages are driven from one shared JSON file for easy updates.
